meanings.definition: A type of coffee made with chocolate and milk.
meanings.sent1: I ordered a delicious mocha at the cafe.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys sipping on a mocha every morning.
meanings.sent3: The mocha was so good, it made me dance a little.
meanings.sent4: The mocha was a warm hug in a cup.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the mocha filled the room, tempting everyone.

meanings.definition: A strong coffee made from beans grown in Yemen.
meanings.sent1: The mocha from Yemen is known for its bold flavor.
meanings.sent2: He prefers the intense taste of Yemeni mocha.
meanings.sent3: The mocha from Yemen packed a punch that woke me up instantly.
meanings.sent4: Sipping on Yemeni mocha felt like diving into a sea of energy.
meanings.sent5: The rich mocha from Yemen lingered on his taste buds long after he finished.

meanings.sent1: Her hair was a beautiful shade of mocha.
meanings.sent2: The mocha paint added warmth to the room.
meanings.sent3: The mocha shoes matched perfectly with her outfit.
meanings.sent4: The mocha sky at dusk painted a serene picture.
meanings.sent5: The mocha of the earth blended seamlessly with the green of the trees.
